root: ^Seems like you are in the same predicament as before...
^Perhaps there is more knowledge to be found somewhere nearby?

main: ^Oh you again, what did you find this time?
Incorrect: ^No, that is not right...Oh and the monsters seemed to have followed you. Deal with them!
^....or that's what I would say if it was programmed in. Try again!
Correct: ^Perfect, this will help in so many ways...
^Oh yes, you wanted to move on?
^There, I have used my magic to make you a way forward! I do hope we meet again...
